author: Saberin C
description:
R.F. Kuang first teased readers back in 2023 with the announcement of her first love story. Come 2025, it has reached the top of countless anticipated reads lists (including ours here at Grimdark Magazine), and has received an immense amount of acclaim already. Katabasis is the story of two PhD students who travel to hell […]

The post REVIEW: Katabasis by R.F. Kuang appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Katabasis by R.F. Kuang
